code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='https://api.yourdomain.com/auth/';const login=async(email,password)=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}login`,{email,password});localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(response.data));return response.data;};const register=async(email,password)=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}register`,{email,password});localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(response.data));return response.data;};const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('user');};const getCurrentUser=()=>{return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));};const AuthService={login,register,logout,getCurrentUser};export default AuthService;
